mapper.sql: ID, TASKID, DRAFTLOGIN, DRAFTNAME, STATUS, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, TEXTPATH, ATTACHPATH, FILETYPE, TITLE, TEXTNAME, ATTACHNAME, PARENTROOT, DATAID, PROLOGIN, PRONAME, PROTIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from FMS_TASK
order by ${orderByClause}
